content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Farhad, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment to be a great place to live. So, what price were you thinking for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given the location and condition of the apartment, I would expect to pay around 600 euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but that's quite a bit lower than what I was expecting. The apartment is in the city center and very close to all amenities. I think a more reasonable price would be around 800 euros per month. What do you think about that?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your point of view. However, I believe that 650 euros per month would be a more reasonable price, considering that the apartment is unfurnished.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand that you're looking for a good deal, but 650 euros is still below my asking price. How about we meet in the middle at 725 euros per month? I think that's a fair compromise. What do you say?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for considering my offer. Considering the unfurnished state of the apartment, I think 675 euros per month would be more reasonable.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hmm, 675 euros is closer to what I was hoping for, but I still believe 725 euros is a fair price for the location and amenities. Would you be willing to meet at 700 euros per month? This is a very good deal for you, considering the central location and brand-new condition of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your offer. However, I believe 675 euros per month is the highest I can afford.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your financial constraints, but as a landlord, I have expenses to cover as well. If you can't afford 700 euros, I'm afraid I can't go any lower. I'm sorry, but I'm going to have to decline your offer. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is too low for the value of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position. Therefore, I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is too high for my budget.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand that you have a budget to consider. If you're not willing to pay 700 euros per month, then I'm sorry, but I'm going to have to terminate the negotiation. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
